text: Ronja Oja (born 31 July 1992) is a blind Finnish Paralympic athlete who competes in sprinting and long jump events in international level events. Her brother Jesper Oja is her running guide in track events. ==References== Category:1992 births Category:Living people Category:Sportspeople from Espoo Category:Paralympic athletes of Finland Category:Finnish female sprinters Category:Finnish female long jumpers Category:Athletes (track and field) at the 2016 Summer Paralympics
title: Ronja Oja
